website_summaries.verdict: This eyeliner is easy to apply, comes in attractive shades, and resists moisture.
pros: Goes on smoothly, and doesn't pull at delicate eye skin
Has a built-in smudging tip for creating different looks
Colors are highly-pigmented, and wear for hours for most users
cons: The delicate tip means you'll have to be extra careful when sharpening it
Tends to smudge on oily skin

customer_reviews.title: This product boast waterproof.  IT IS NOT WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof at all. Runs after sweating, expect raccoon eyes. Doesn't sharpen well. The only thing I like is that it applies to your inner eyeliner (water line) easily compared to most eyeliners. So I use this only on my inner eyeliner, then a different product on my outer eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Grogan

customer_reviews.title: This definitely wares off during the course of the day ...
customer_reviews.text: This definitely wares off during the course of the day, which was disappointing, because a lot of other reviewers didn't have this comment. I prefer all-day wear, but this isn't that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ann Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Read the return policy before you consider buying .
customer_reviews.text: I used my eye liner pencil for 5 days. After the 5th day I went to extend The make up by twisting it with no luck. I can only assume this pencil is broken. Surly I didn’t spend that much for 5 days of very very light use . Before you order read the return policy on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Item is UNBOXED and packaged in cheap plastci.
customer_reviews.text: Item is sold unboxed? If its made by Urban Decay, it should be in its original packaging. Indicate in your listing its not in original packaging but some cheap zip plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Coz

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: Meh it’s okay. I use the two faced mascara so I thought I’d try the eye liner. I was disappointed with how easy it comes off and smudges.the application is great and looks nice but not for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: WyoTransfer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping I could use a nice pencil eyeliner but as soon as I opened the cap, the tip fell off. There is no twist function so I could bring up some more of the lead portion so I ended up with barely any left. It quickly becomes rounded, which you don't buy pencil eyeliner for. 13$ absolutely wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: BEST EYELINER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST eyeliner ever. I've used a ton and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Candis Mae

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great pigmentation, goes on smooth, stays put all day. Cons: Hard to justify value since you have to sharpen the pencil every other day or so and the actual product breaks off pretty easily. Would really love to see this same formula in a 'twist up' variation instead of having to sharpen with a sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with my latest purchase. Constantly breaks after sharpened and wants to fall apart and crumble.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Pankratz

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what ingredient is causing it, but I am having an allergic reaction under my eyes. It's a decent eyeliner but does not stay on the waterline for more than 1 hour. It also doesn't stay too well under the eye. Though it does stay on the eyelid. I would prefer to get a refund due to the allergic reaction within 2 weeks, but I guess we will see.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great value! I use this everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Used this liner for years and love it. It stays on great
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner ! Even with my mask on my I still look good
customer_reviews.author: visaac1

customer_reviews.title: Very good liner
customer_reviews.text: Love product, but thought i ordered brown i got black, black itsnt the best on me, i use sometimes, i really love The brown
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bagnall

customer_reviews.title: This product is not what I expected. I put ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what I expected. I put it in my water line and it smears, doesn't stay put. It is long lasting but I bought it thinking it would not smear all over the place
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Liked the price, but the quality is awful. Didn’t even come in a box. Would not twist up, had to throw it away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: omgsh - best ever
customer_reviews.text: i love this product i love this product i love this product i love this product i love this product I think this might be the best eyeliner I have ever used - It never moves when I am at work!!! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eraka McCulla

customer_reviews.title: Did not like this product
customer_reviews.text: Each time I sharpen the point...there is no eyeliner. .
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I really love this liner it glides on like butter so happy with my purchase the price is worth it it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mitsiopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: First one came in broke in half. Second one was fine. Doesnt last long
customer_reviews.author: megan keyser

customer_reviews.title: My Fav!
customer_reviews.text: So sad TooFaced had discontinued this item. It’s my favorite eye liner to date!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Geannaris

customer_reviews.title: best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: this is the BEST eyeliner on the market. others give me an allergic reaction...this one does not. highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: pussycat

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The pencil is soft, and thats exactly what I wanted, one tip is the pencil in the color I bought, Perfect Black, the other is a soft spongy tip to gently daub it once you put the line on, dont use a heavy hand, its so soft it goes on easily, then you can smear it slightly with the other end. Great product specially for those times I want a dramatic look when I go out for the evening.
customer_reviews.author: readingisfun

customer_reviews.title: Only got to uses before it needs to be sharpened ...
customer_reviews.text: Only got to uses before it needs to be sharpened. Also was a humid day and after 8 hours it had smeared. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Hollow Inside!  Where's the pencil??
customer_reviews.text: I tried two of these, and in both cases, the pencil was only on the tip. When sharpening it, it was hollow inside. I thought the first one was defective, so I tried again, and it was the same thing. I would not recommend this product based on my two negative experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This liner is very soft and gildes on really well. Its fine for my upper lid, but not waterproof enough for my water line. I find that it hurts my eyes if i try to wear it on my lower lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product very wonderful and easy to use .. Thank you ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many supposedly waterproof and smudge proof eye pencils only to find that they aren't, in fact, either. Too Faced truly is smudge and water proof, but will dissipate by the end of the day (instead of the hour, with most)---which is fine with me. It's great, too, that it's made without paraban's, like most.
customer_reviews.author: Benaya

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It broke right away it was a waste of my hard earned money I didn't send it back cause I didnt save the box
customer_reviews.author: Jo-an I Holleman

customer_reviews.title: Application is hard
customer_reviews.text: First of all it is so soft that it does not maintain it's firmness when applying. Second, it is not a retractable pencil, but one that needs to be sharpened - this means that half the soft core is lost each time you sharpen (what a waste!) and the sharp pencil edges poke the eyes on every application. I love the actual black core itself and the fact that it is waterproof, just that it is nearly impossible to apply. With the price I am paying for it, I expect the basics to be in place! My suggestion to improve the overall quality is to make it a retractable pencil with a slightly firmer core.
customer_reviews.author: Rguest

customer_reviews.title: BRING THESE BACK!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why Too Faced quit making these. They are the best pencils compared to the ones they offer now. What a shame. These are becoming extinct.
customer_reviews.author: kjdoodle

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner pencil I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic eye liner! It goes on as smoothly as liquid, but as easily as a pencil. It stayed on perfectly all day. Most pencils just disappear on me during the day. And it came off easily with makeup remover. It's a bit pricey, but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: G. Galanti

customer_reviews.title: great eye liner
customer_reviews.text: This pencil liner applies well to my lower eye lid. It needs to be sharpened as you use it. I like that it goes on easily and is easy to clean off at the end of the day, but it stays on well during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E.

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner you can buy, everyone always asks me what I use. It is a nice soft crayon, with a great lasting pigment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. I'm still on the hunt for the perfect shapener for this pencil though. After the first couple uses when it comes time to sharpen it does not go back to it's "fresh out the box" point. it's just that soft. It gets even more dull, resulting in a more smudgy look, when I prefer cleaner lines. Ah....the struggle.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't run, smear or irritate. I've gone through ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't run, smear or irritate. I've gone through a lot of liners over the years and now I use this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ROUSER, E

customer_reviews.title: the size of the pencil triples the size of the product in
customer_reviews.text: the pencil was almost empty. The gel inside the pencil was very small. It ran out the first time I had to sharpen it
customer_reviews.author: Marielena Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: I like this for my top lid. Goes on great, and stays on all day. I don't like it on my undereye. It does not stay on well. And the tip broke right away when I got it, so that seemed like a waste. Apply very lightly, no need to put pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Gronseth

customer_reviews.title: Good control and value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner! Waterproof so no smudging and easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: MimiRocks

customer_reviews.title: the only thing I don't like is that it's not enough on the stick for ...
customer_reviews.text: Glides on very smooth, the only thing I don't like is that it's not enough on the stick for the price
customer_reviews.author: Eriel

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand of eyeliner. Looks natural, goes on smoothly, stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sonar girl

customer_reviews.title: staying power!
customer_reviews.text: So ,far this is the best eyeliner I've bought. Lasts all day...even pretty long on the water/tightline.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J.

customer_reviews.title: Smudges
customer_reviews.text: Was so hopeful that it would stay put all day. It doesn't. First time I looked in the mirror it was smudged. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: boris1159

customer_reviews.title: Only eyeliner I will use.
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner out there! I will not use any other kind. Smooth distribution and will not smudge during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tweela Collier

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for special occasions applies easily, and stays on great. Is very dark and only needs one layer, the only thing I would change is a built in sharpener or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Holhelm

customer_reviews.title: favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in black, espresso, and brown. It's my favorite; I use it every day. It goes on smoothly and stays all day. It goes on boldly so I dont have to push hard to get good application.
customer_reviews.author: Rugbygirl4

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product with good quality
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product with good quality!!! :D My only complaint is that sharpening it is difficult and you waist a lot of the eyeliner while doing it. AMAZING eye liner and stay ability!!! (not to mention that I LOVE that it's cruelty free).
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorites! The only reason I didn't give this a 5 star is because I don't personally like pencils that I have to sharpen. Otherwise, this was water and smudge proof.
customer_reviews.author: Coop254

product_meta.title: Too Faced Perfect Eyes Waterproof Eyeliner, Perfect Black, 0.04 Ounce
product_meta.description: Our creamy, long-wearing eye liners glide on with the ease of a liquid liner and lock down for 8 hours of budge-proof, smudge-proof wear. These high-impact pencils come in six waterproof shades ranging from the necessary classic to cutting-edge couture. Each includes a flexi-firm, beveled smudger to allow for a smokey blend or precise line.
feature_bullets: Once applied our perfect eye liner wont transfer, smudge or budge
Our creamy smooth liner glides on effortlessly never pulling, skipping or slipping
Our good-for-you formula is free of parabens, mineral oil and paraffins

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
